name: Fetch Alerts from SIEM
description: Fetches alerts by querying to SIEM

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

steps.name: Query for Control Panel Item Execution

steps.name: Query for Regsvcs and Regasm command line

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND  event_data.CommandLine:C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework*\\*\\Reg*.exe*.dll*

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND (parent_image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe" OR parent_image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\rundll32.exe") NOT (parent_image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*" OR parent_image_path:"C:\\Program Files \(x86\)\\*" OR parent_image_path:"C:\\Program Files\\*")

routes.name: Elastic Query for Sysmon MSHTA -> Elastic Query for MSHTA Child
Elastic Query for processes spawned by Regsvcs and Regasm -> Elastic Query for Regsvcs and Regasm command line
Elastic Query for Sysmon Compiled HTML -> Elastic Query for Control Panel Item Execution
Elastic query for InstallUtil Via Command Line -> Elastic query for Sysmon InstallUtil Child
Elastic query for Sysmon Rundll32 -> Step Output
Elastic Query for Regsvcs and Regasm command line -> Elastic query for Sysmon Rundll32
Configuration -> Elastic Query for Sysmon CMSTP
Elastic Query for MSHTA Child -> Elastic Query for processes spawned by Regsvcs and Regasm
Elastic query for Sysmon InstallUtil Child -> Elastic Query for Sysmon MSHTA
Elastic Query for Sysmon CMSTP -> Elastic Query for Sysmon Compiled HTML
Elastic Query for Control Panel Item Execution -> Elastic query for InstallUtil Via Command Line
